title: Why Do We Laugh?
description: Why do we laugh? Why do you feel ticklish when someone tickles you? Why can't you tickle yourself? We learn about how humor develops with Gina Mireault of the Infant Laughter Project at Northern Vermont University.
itunes:subtitle: Why do we laugh? Why do you feel ticklish when someone tickles you? Why can't you tickle yourself?
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
